channel.title: Rounded rectangle tool making unwanted shape when clicking canvas
channel.description:
When I click canvas on photoshop I get this shape, anyone know what??
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/jktz7p.png[/img]

item.title: Rounded rectangle tool making unwanted shape when clicking canvas
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:10, topic:303962”][quote author=sppt link=topic=400223.msg2990433#msg2990433 date=1255263921]
http://www.schillmania.com/projects/dialog2/
[/quote]

Why is it when i double clik on that page it goes spazzy? Do they not realise some people like to click alot while reading?[/quote]
I just found it it’s a fluidity demo.

item.title: Rounded rectangle tool making unwanted shape when clicking canvas
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

.roundedCorners{
-webkit-border-radius: 6px;
-moz-border-radius: 6px;
}

???

You’re incredibly stupid.

[ul][li]Make Shape[/li]
[li]Right Click[/li]
[li]Make Selection[/li][/ul]
